RelatedSentence: California Chrome will be permitted to wear a nasal strip in the Belmont Stakes on June 7 .

The Kentucky Derby and Preakness winner has worn a strip , which is similar to those worn by athletes to assist with breathing , in his wins in California , Kentucky and Maryland - but rules in New York did n't allowed for its use , without permission from racing stewards .

Monday , stewards at Belmont Park unanimously agreed to allow the use of equine nasal strips for all horses running at New York Racing Association racetracks .
Monday , stewards at Belmont Park unanimously agreed to allow the use of equine nasal strips for all horses running at New York Racing Association racetracks .

After California Chrome 's trainer Art Sherman contacted stewards on Sunday afternoon to request permission for his horse to use nasal strips , analysis was sought from New York State Gaming Commission equine medical director Scott E. Palmer .
The stewards considered Dr. Palmer 's advice and determined to allow the unregulated use of the nasal strips .

California Chrome is expected to leave Baltimore 's Pimlico Race Course on Tuesday morning to head up to Belmont Park .
